snippet.title: Syria on track to meet April deadline for chemical weapons disposal, OPCW says
snippet.description:
* Syria has destroyed a majority of its chemical weapons material, the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said Saturday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/19/world/meast/syria-civil-war/index.html

snippet.title: U.S.: signs point to Syria using chlorine gas in attacks
snippet.description:
* The Obama administration and its allies believe the Syrian government may have used chlorine gas in a deadly attack this month on its own people, several U.S. officials and other diplomats told CNN.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/21/world/meast/syria-chemical-u-s-/index.html

snippet.title: Syria submits revised plan for removing chemicals
snippet.description:
* Syria has submitted a revised proposal "that aims to complete the removal of all chemicals" from the country before the end of April, the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons said Tuesday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/04/world/meast/syria-civil-war/index.html

snippet.title: Inside Politics Speed Read: Pop quiz on Obama's rough foreign trip
snippet.description:
* Pop quiz on Obama’s foreign trip: There was a point during his news conference in South Korea on Friday morning when President Obama referenced how the U.S. was standing up to a rogue world player. “We don’t reward bad behavior,” he said, before...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/25/inside-politics-speed-read-pop-quiz-on-obamas-rough-foreign-trip/

snippet.title: Can 'odd couple' Kerry and Lavrov take the edge off Ukraine crisis talks?
snippet.description:
* U.S.-Russian ties may be at their frostiest since the height of the Cold War, but at least there's some warmth to the relationship between U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry and Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/16/world/europe/ukraine-talks-kerry-lavrov/index.html

snippet.title: Eyewitness: Barrel bombs are Syrian regime’s way of saying “I don’t care”
snippet.description:
* With fears that Syria’s chemical weapons deal brokered by the US and Russia has only “strengthened” Bashar al-Assad’s government, one eyewitness inside Syria tells CNN the regime has stepped up its firepower in his Damascus suburb. “We have been hit by...
http://amanpour.blogs.cnn.com/2014/02/05/eyewitness-barrel-bombs-are-syrian-regimes-way-of-saying-i-dont-care/

snippet.title: Are Syria, Iran playing Obama for a fool?
snippet.description:
* Remember Syria's chemical weapons? Yes, those, the ones the Syrian regime agreed to give up after President Obama threatened to bomb.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/01/31/opinion/ghitis-iran-syria-gap/index.html
